# To install:  

#First install devtools  
install.packages("devtools")  
#Load devtools  
library(devtools)  
#Install RandomArt  
install_github("danvdm/RandomArt")  
#load RandomArt  
library(RandomArt)  

Function make_art() to create beautiful random art. Input takes a number as seed.
